segments.text: I see the woman in her apron, looking so content in her routine, completely absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her long focus on that plate is almost admirable, but it’s also distressing to witness her disregard for the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so unaware of the water streaming down the cabinets?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she feel the dampness gathering at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the sun is shining brightly, but it feels like this place is trapped in chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to step in and shake her out of her focus, to show her the danger looming behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s frustrating to watch this ordinary moment turn into a recipe for disaster without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
